speaker: CLOTEN
text: which will then be a torment to her contempt.

speaker: CLOTEN
text: He on the ground, my speech of insultment

speaker: CLOTEN
text: ended on his dead body, and when my lust hath

speaker: CLOTEN
text: dined—which, as I say, to vex her I will execute

speaker: CLOTEN
text: in the clothes that she so praised—to the court

speaker: CLOTEN
text: I’ll knock her back, foot her home again. She hath

speaker: CLOTEN
text: despised me rejoicingly, and I’ll be merry in my

speaker: CLOTEN
text: revenge.

speaker: CLOTEN
text: Be those the garments?

speaker: PISANIO
text: Ay, my noble lord.

speaker: CLOTEN
text: How long is ’t since she went to Milford Haven?

speaker: PISANIO
text: She can scarce be there yet.

speaker: CLOTEN
text: Bring this apparel to my chamber; that is the

speaker: CLOTEN
text: second thing that I have commanded thee. The

speaker: CLOTEN
text: third is that thou wilt be a voluntary mute to my

speaker: CLOTEN
text: design. Be but duteous, and true preferment shall

speaker: CLOTEN
text: tender itself to thee. My revenge is now at Milford.

speaker: CLOTEN
text: Would I had wings to follow it! Come, and be true.

speaker: PISANIO
text:
Thou
               
              bidd’st
               
              me
               
              to
               
              my
               
              loss
              ,
               
              for
               
              true
               
              to
               
              thee

speaker: PISANIO
text:
Were
               
              to
               
              prove
               
              false
              ,
               
              which
               
              I
               
              will
               
              never
               
              be
              ,

speaker: PISANIO
text:
To
               
              him
               
              that

              .

              ,

speaker: PISANIO
text:
And

              ,

You

speaker: PISANIO

Be
